text: Yesli kto-libo iz vas skonchayetsya i ostavit posle sebya zhen, to oni dolzhny vyzhidat' chetyre mesyatsa i desyat' dney. Kogda zhe oni dozhdutsya istecheniya polozhennogo im sroka, to na vas ne budet grekha, yesli oni rasporyadyatsya soboy razumnym obrazom. Allakh vedayet o tom, chto vy sovershayete
